name: Diamond Farm
description: You don't want to try yourself as a farmer, manage the farm, monitor the growth of the crop, collect and sell it, earn profit and invest money in the development of technology and get even more profit and wealth. Interested? Maybe then it's worth a try? Just want to warn You that the firm will not be simple, it is farm with diamond, where You have to harvest diamonds. !!! To grow diamonds even easier to care for Pets or to monitor the vegetable garden for diamonds need minimal maintenance and operation, and the income will be more and more. !! Not believe?! Try!
